documents.document: Excellent price-quality-ratio It was the 2nd time we stayed in this hotel. It is situated in a quit street near the There are some rather good restaurants in the surrounding. The staf is very helpful and if you have certain wishes concerning your room they realy try to realize these. The breakfast was very good and abundant. Use of the internet is free. We booked via BOOKINGS, so there were no additional costs.Very recommandable.
